content: around 5 4 increase single_crochet around 6 5 - 7 single_crochet around 6 leave tail for sewing stuff with magic_ring tail use fasten_off tail to sew to the magic_ring of segment 1 the spiral of the crochet might create a bit of an angle to the magic_ring of segment 1 and the end of segment 2 which you can line up to create the bend in the leg tie off then pull the pink tail through the blue segment and stuff with this tail and the magic_ring tail use fasten_off tail to sew leg to body the first pair of legs is attached 1 row from the pedipalps one row higher on the head attach the other legs next to these leaving no space in between the stitches of the next leg may actually go into the previous leg keeping these close together ensures there will be space for the body to attach
